name: Spring Stealer
description:
One day it is cold in March and snowy, and the next is a hot day in mid-July. An unforgotten spring has been taken away from Todd. Play in Full-Screen for the best experience.  CONTENT WARNING 

The game contains materials that may find disturbing. This includes Sexual Assault, Abuse, Self-harm and suicide, Violence, Death, Blood, Mental illness, Racism, Sexism. 

Credit: 

This game is only for educational purposes. I do not own pictures, sound effects and music in the game. (I did the drawings tho : - )

Several great OST by Onmyji: The card game

Several great song, Fever Dream by Aerocity

A sad song from Kimi no Nawa

A horrific song, Lights Out by Final Light

Great ending song, Rising up by MC Cullah

Many pictures and sound effect from Internet and RPG Maker va (my savior) 

Website background by Leyao Yu. 

I really hope you enjoy this game!
